description.value:
Requires a Mechanicus Implants and Operate(Aeronautica)/Pilot(Personal). Doubles Base movement speed, can be used to gain Flyer (12) for one minute. After using Flyer Trait, make +0 Toughness Test or gain 1 Fatigue. Its Mechanical Wings give Fear(1) and +10 to Parry Tests by buffetting enemies.

Requirements

Draws power from the Potentia Coil.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
